seo.title: Dumpus | Stats for Discord
seo.description: Get detailed insights and stats for your Discord account

shared.trust: Why should I trust the app?
trustContent: Dumpus is 100% open source. You can read the code on [GitHub](https://github.com/dumpus-app/dumpus-app), and even host your own server.
We also have a completely [client-side web app](https://ddpe.androz2091.fr), with less features but without any external API.
The app is working without any readable data stored on the external API. If you still have any questions, feel free to contact us at contact@dumpus.app.
shared.30DaysDelay: Keep in mind it can take up to 30 days to receive the email. Be patient!

slides.title: How does Dumpus work?
slides.description: Discord records every action you perform on their app in your "Data Package". Dumpus analyzes this package to generate statistics and information about your account.

slides.title: Can I trust Dumpus?
slides.description: This "Data Package" is very sensitive. That's why anyone can read our code and see what we do with it (100% open source). Although we offer a free processing server, you can use your own server to keep full control over your data.

slides.title: Share it with your friends!
slides.description: While statistics are funny to see, they are even more fun to compare with your friends. That is why we have made it easy to share your stats with your friends.

setup.title: How do I get my data package?
setup.description: Select an operating system to get started.

link.title: Enter your Discord link
link.description: You can get it in the email received from Discord. Copy the link from the button entitled **You can download it here**.
link.backendURLHint: Your own hosted open source server URL
link.notice: By proceeding, you agree to our [privacy policy](/privacy) and our [terms](/terms).

email.title: Transfer the email (soon)
content: Transfer the email received from Discord to **process@dumpus.app**. We'll send you a link when it's ready.

queue.title: You're in the queue!
whyContent: Dumpus is a free service, and our server can't analyze more than a few packages at the same time.
That's why we have a queue, to make sure everyone can use the service.
You can self-host our API server to avoid the queue.

stats.messagesSentPerDay: That's about {{- value}} messages per day!
stats.joinedServersDesc: We've got a real Discord server explorer!
stats.knownUsersDesc: Well, you know a lot of people!
stats.appStartsPerDay: You open Discord about {{- value}} times per day!
stats.totalTimeSpent: You spent about {{- value}} on Discord
